name: Cut the Rope Om Nom Candy Reversible Comforter

reviews.name: Cut the Rope Om Nom Candy Reversible Comforter
reviews.reviewText: My 3 year old grand daughter Loves It!!! Couldn't wait to get it on the bed. Only wish it came with a pillow sham. Other places had it for $54.
reviews.title: Bright and Colorful

reviews.name: Cut the Rope Om Nom Candy Reversible Comforter
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my granddaughter along with the matching sheet set. This is one of her favorite characters. She has the stuffed animal and she loves playing the game, so she was thrilled to get the bedding set. It makes her room so happy. There is not a matching bed skirt but it is fine, as she already has others that match the bedding. I am really happy to have found the comforter and sheet set, it is too cute in the room and she really loves it.
reviews.title: 19 September 2013

reviews.name: Cut the Rope Om Nom Candy Reversible Comforter
reviews.reviewText: The comforter is cheaply made. The graphics imprinted on the fabric are faded. Not worth $37.
reviews.title: Cheap Fabric

reviews.name: Cut the Rope Om Nom Candy Reversible Comforter
reviews.reviewText: My son just love it. It's cheap compared to other stores with the same item.
reviews.title: 01 October 2013

reviews.name: Cut the Rope Om Nom Candy Reversible Comforter
reviews.reviewText: My son loves this. We just got it a week ago and he thinks it's the best thing ever. I haven't washed it yet, but I'm sure if I wash on cold and gentle, all will be good.
reviews.title: Nice, bright colors!
